sid.description: The unique identifier for the role.

account_sid.description: The unique identifier for the account associated with the role.

service_sid.description: The unique identifier for the service associated with the role.

friendly_name.description: A user-friendly name assigned to the role.

type.description: The type or category of the role.

permissions.description: The list of permissions assigned to the role.

date_created.description: The date and time when the role was created.

date_updated.description: The date and time when the role was last updated.

url.description: The URL for accessing the role data.
